bio: Chaser of Shiny Objects, Enchanted by Fantastical Technology, Innovator, Business Disruptor, Weekend Adventurer, Dad, Digital Early Adopter, Knowledge Seeker, Overachiever, Kayaker, Skydiver, Hang Glider, Climber, Hot Air Ballooner University of South Florida MBA University of South Florida Anthropology Cox Enterprises Sr. Director of Emerging Technology Cox Enterprises Director of Digital Innovation
